hometown: Taipei, Taiwan & Boston, MA & New York, NY & Rockville, MD
about: I liked Hans Zimmer but am more recently into Beethoven and Schubert; highly recommend giving Appassionata a listen. I enjoy light-tasting Taiwanese foods (bitter melon stew!) and gas stoves. My favorite pickles are Ba Tampte, half sour, only at Wegmans. Like cucumbers, but with garlic.
teams: O-week: Front-end developer (1 year), Product Manager (1 year); Events: Product Manager (1 year)
